name: Karma Snack Miami Web Marketing Company
description: Karma Snack is a full service integrated Internet marketing agency. We specialize in Problem Solving for you. Whether it is increase in traffic, through search engine marketing, or increasing leads with your current traffic by using conversion optimization, the solutions you have been looking for are now more easily available. With our services, we increase your online business's presences not online in the major searches, but also on the social media, and web 2.0 aspects of the Internet.
